text: Melissa González is an American actress best known for taking over the role of Gabriela "Gaby" Fernández from Mayteana Morales on the PBS kids' show Ghostwriter. Her other work includes Light It Up and Doin' It Right, a PBS special from 1998 about a group of Chicago child actors. == External links == * Category:American television actresses Category:Living people Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Melissa González (actress)
